website_summaries.verdict: This officially licensed PlayStation dock charges quickly and is simple to use.
pros: A straightforward dual-charging station that brings your DualShock 4 controllers up to full charge in 1.3 hours
Controllers sit upright in the cradle, clicking into place and charging via the extension port
The station can charge 2 controllers at once and will stop charging when the battery is full
Customers love the click-in and click-out system
cons: A few customers have reported duds

website_summaries.verdict: A charging station that ensures you'll never have to worry about your controller's battery life running out.
pros: Snap-down charging design, so all you have to do is set your controller on either side of the station and lock it into place for fast, easy charging
Provides a full charge in approximately 1.3 hours
Enables you to quickly and effortlessly charge 2 controllers at the same time
cons: Less sturdy than other charging docks

customer_reviews.title: It does the job!!
customer_reviews.text: They work well. I bought these because I didn't want to leave the ps4 on Rest mode just to charge the controllers. Unlike the ps3, the ps4 controllers batteries last considerably less.There aren't any led light on the unit, that isn't a must-have for me because the DS4 blink when they are charging ,and stop when fully charged(just like when being charged from the console.). You can charge two controllers simultaneously(or just one ).They come with an AC adapter , so you can charge them pretty much away from the PS4. Once you press the DS4 down on the base, it locks down.To release, you do the same thing.Any questions, don't hesitate to ask.
customer_reviews.author: Bighugeg

customer_reviews.title: Its a gamble
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my kids and one for my nephew, the one my nephew has works fine, but ours does not always work. One charger port works as it should, they other one charges sometimes if you position the controller just right. Swapping the controllers to the other port doesn't resolve the problem so I am confident it is the charger. Since we purchased one that works and one that doesn't I gave it two stars, it would be a great product if quality control was a bit better, but I guess at this price you are taking the gamble.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't charge till full battery
customer_reviews.text: It charges alright. I wish there was some sort of option to simply place a controller on charger and not have to worry about holes lining up. This has been an annoyance to line up without turning the system back on. Also you must push it down and up and essentially reset the charge to get it to work at all. Good idea but poor design and follow through especially from a name brand product. I was looking for something because my kids were having trouble with the other plug in charging options. This will work for now but looking for better options.
customer_reviews.author: E.A.G.

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: This charger appears to charge the controllers when first docked, however within 5 minutes the lights shut off and controllers cease to charge. I suspect it must be a contact issue with the pins. Re-seating the controllers works temporarily, but the same issue reoccurs. Both of my controllers were dead after sitting on the charger all night. No information regarding warranty in the description. Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and faulty product.
customer_reviews.text: The product came and it was already broken when it arrived. Not a shipping issue. The product is flimsy and you are supposed to push down on the controller that is docked to engage the charging. One side doesn’t stay down, it keeps clicking and popping off so the controller doesn’t charge. In addition, the connection to the bottom of the controller is loose and doesn’t connect very well to the controller. I know there are a lot of positive reviews and even the person that recommended this product to me loves it. But I was not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Balka

customer_reviews.title: Bought new, looked used
customer_reviews.text: I bought this charging station "New" and it definitely came as a "Used" item. I didn't think it was that big of a deal at first, until i tried charging my PS4 Controller...you have to mess around with getting the controller seated on the charging dock just right or it will not work. If this continues, I'm returning item...kinda ridiculous how cheap products for gaming are built today. ***UPDATE AS OF 06/26/2020*** After using it for almost a week, I managed to get the hang of this charging station. It charges very well and works good, still giving it 4 Stars because of receiving it in a "Used" condition instead of the "New" condition as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: djshorti

customer_reviews.title: Product didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Bought product twice. First time purchased product work well would rate it a 3 star. Cheap plastic is used. But you get what you pay for. Second time i bought it the product only worked twice. Remotes will light up when plugged in but will not receive a charge. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: victor espinoza

customer_reviews.title: This is a defective product
customer_reviews.text: First I will say it does charge the controllers which is positive. My 1 star review is due to it being a complete annoyance to use. It requires you to position it so it somehow maintains contact which isn't as easy as it sounds. It doesn't actually have a way to hold it into place(possibly could work using a rubber band). Another issue is the slightest breeze can cause it to stop charging. Overall it does charge but is more difficult than it needs to be. Not worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Apoclypze

customer_reviews.title: Painfully difficult to dock
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a charger that easily docks one or two dualshock controllers, this charging station is likely not for you. The amount of frustration which can be generated from orienting the DualShock controller just perfect in order to seat it in the charging station is excruciating. Once it is docked, it does charge quickly, and it does a fair job of keeping the controllers upright. As other posters have mentioned though, the construction is very cheap and flimsy. Overall, I would not recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: David Lovejoy

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, bit it’s a little finicky
customer_reviews.text: This charges two controllers just fine. And in theory I like the mechanism that clicks when the controller is pressed down, but I’ve found that it’s a little difficult to align the charging port with the plug, and sometimes even after I’m sure I’ve clicked it down, it doesn’t actually charge. I think the mechanism is touchy and sometimes clicks and unclicks rapidly, so my 8 year old doesn’t seat the controller correctly more often than not. Still, as long as you double check that charging begins, it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: l3bowsk1

customer_reviews.title: finicky, starts charging then stops.
customer_reviews.text: First charger one side did not work. Replacement charger works sort of. It is very touchy, if you put one charger on and get it charging then then put another controller on, the first one stops charging. If you manage to get both charging and bump the table or even blow on the controllers they stop charging. Dont waste your time or money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Caddy

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: The cradle does not seem to charge or connect to controllers very well. Have had controllers plugged in all night, only to be only slightly charged in the morning. For an official product its not the best. There are much better 3rd party charging stands with charging lights .
customer_reviews.author: Todd J. Jumper

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well.
customer_reviews.text: This charger is extremely hard to use. When you have 1 controller charging and attempt to put another on it always knocks the first charger off. Any slight vibration causes the charger to pop up and stop charging. That's if you can actually get it to latch in the first place. Terrible purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal L. Suttles

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works
customer_reviews.text: Having to charge your PS4 controllers is a pain when you use multiple cords so I ended up buying a charging station from the Amazon warehouse section and I'm not sure if it's because it's because of the item's condition or just a design flaw but sometimes when I try to charge my controllers it doesn't charge. It lights up and shows it is but ends up not charging and I end up stuck with 2 uncharge controllers with little to no battery :(
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Charges fast works great very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Usb charging port in my controller died and didnt want to buy a new controller found out you can charge controllers from the port on the front of controller where you would plug in a keyboard and headset so I ordered this because it was a sony product and it saved me from having to buy a new controller put the controller on the charger and it charged very quick very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: codychadwick

customer_reviews.title: When it works, it's great
customer_reviews.text: Both charging ports worked for about a month. We're now only down to 1 working charger with the other only lighting up as we set the controller on the port. Once you remove your hand from the controller after it clicks, the light turns off and the controller doesn't charge. It's no fun getting ready to sit down to enjoy a game and having the console warn you that you're battery is about to die. Talk about a mood killer.
customer_reviews.author: Jynna McMillin

customer_reviews.title: Slick looking charger with bit of a spring problem.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Has very grippy pegs on the bottom so it doesn't slide around when you try to plug in the controllers. One thing and I think it's pretty big, the guides for the controllers are designed perfectly so that the connector goes exactly where it needs to every time, the problem is that the spring mechanism doesn't click in 6 out of 10 times so you have to keep pushing the controllers down until they light up. Hopefully that problem irons itself out in time. Will update soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Controllers don't charge
customer_reviews.text: I see most reviews are positive, but add me to the small chorus of negative reviews for the same reason as theirs: my controllers don't charge because they won't seat properly. Only way to maintain a connection (orange glow) is to push down on the controller, and keep it there. Otherwise even the *slightest* jiggle breaks the connection and the controller is basically just resting there, uncharged. Returning asap.
customer_reviews.author: alexakajojo

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Aesthetically Pleasing
customer_reviews.text: This charging base works great. I was concerned about the flimsy base at first after seeing some negative reviews about it, but I ordered one anyway. I don't think it's going to be a problem. It just sits on the entertainment center it's whole life. The click you get when pressing a controller into the charging dock is a nice assurance that it's seated correctly. I'm surprised this dock was this inexpensive. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Should be better
customer_reviews.text: The material, I'll be it, is plastic but very very cheap and light weight. I wish the cord used wasn't so long and was a USB so it were compatible to charge via more items (such as a computer or playstation) as opposed to only being able to use a wall outlet. It could also be difficult to actually get the controller in charge as it uses the charging port on the bottom of the controller rather than the micro one would usually use to charge
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: The mounting of the controller is such a way that you have to raise the alignment seat (push down to raise) then place the controller into seat and push down to lock to charge. The problem is you have to push down on areas of the controller where there isn’t any buttons. When you hit the buttons on the controller you don’t know for sure what your console may do.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as easy as it looks
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't really sure about this when I bought it, but I wanted something that could charge my controllers reliably. The footprint is a bit on the bigger side, but it's like that to create kind of a "clearance" for the controllers that will sit there. Charging controllers on the base is exactly as easy as it sounds. Lay the controller on the stand with the buttons facing out and the handles down and it practically settles into the grooves all on it's own. Push down for the click and boom, charging. Push again to pop it out. Knowing that I can leave it in the cradle while not charging is fantastic. It makes for a nice little display.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey S.

customer_reviews.title: Best charging dock I have found.
customer_reviews.text: Great high quality product. I had trouble finding a charging dock that would work for our family. I needed one that was easy to use (I have an eight year old and kids come over to play all the time) and durable. This was the only stand that I found that fit my needs. I liked the one that fits on top of the PS4 but I couldn't use it due to height restrictions where I have my console located. This stand is user friendly and it is attractive and low key in any living room/den. It even has cable routing underneath to help hide the power cord.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bunton

customer_reviews.title: It does what it’s mean to do!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars but it felt really flimsy, like if I was even a little rough something would break. Upside is it’s perfect for what I needed. I was looking for a place to put my controllers and have them charge at the same time, that was out of the way Also I never needed to worry if they were. Once you find the groove, you always know where it lines up when you’re resting the controller back down. Also really easy to switch one controller for the other when the battery’s low.
customer_reviews.author: DjFatKid

customer_reviews.title: Great value and design
customer_reviews.text: It provides us a nice place to store our controllers when not in use and charges them fairly quickly. We use our PS4 regularly so having charged controllers on the daily is a must and this has helped us with that exponentially. No more having to fiddle around with a micro-usb cable; Just place down the controllers for the night and you're done.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't charge the controllers.
customer_reviews.text: Should've listened to the other reviews instead of the Sony endorsement, the actual charger is really just useless. Overall visual design is nice, but the controllers are pushed out of the charger plug itself by the plastic dock, the controllers don't light up unless you either hold them down or position them in a very specific (and unstable) place. The pushing up/down on the springy bit doesn't do anything helpful either. Pretty silly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Too easy to break this.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this charger for it's regular plug in power design (versus USB only) and compact size. Within a week I had a little trouble - when I pressed the controller down onto the power connector, the spring-loaded cradle failed to 'catch', it broke very easily and now one side of the charger is useless. Fortunately the controller is more durable than the charger unit! Bought a different charger and this one is going into the dustbin.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic way to charge those remotes!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is SWEET! I was very impressed by the way this product "connects" the control to begin charging. Back with my PS3, I had purchased a charging deck () that required you to perfectly position the controllers into the slots so they would plug into the mini usb inputs. While not being difficult to do, this sometimes took more time than it should because there was NO margin for error. THIS charger uses the "headphone" input and simply requires you to rest the controller on the deck and "click" in down into place. Simple as can be and I believe this will add to the life of controllers! Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: ahoffoss

customer_reviews.title: Works Great when USB charging port is blown
customer_reviews.text: Got this to charge controllers that were no longer chargeable from the USB charging cord. This charges from the small round hole and adjacent square on the front of the controller, so it your other charging port is blown, this is a better (cheaper) option than buying new controllers. The base itself is a bit wonky and it has to plug into a wall outlet. A USB charger would have been better.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this charging station
customer_reviews.text: I was initially very pleased with this purchase however as time progressed I realized the damage it was doing to the headphone port on my controllers. When you place the controllers down on the station, there is a plastic tip that goes into the headphone port. Seeing as I used all 4 of my controllers with the charging station, all of them have damaged ports. This was a very disappointing revelation as I had recommended this product to many of my friends and have 2 myself.. If they can fix this on the next iteration of this station, I would potentially recommend it again, however at the moment I am left with 4 partially broken controllers which is extremely frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, never forget to charge your controllers again.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I have 2 controllers that I use all the time because my sibling and I like to play a lot since this charges too controllers at the same time this is a must have! Because when I didn't have this I'd have to charge one then charge the other or sometimes I'd forget but these are just things that make your life easier so I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: David Bejerano

customer_reviews.title: Some are good some are not
customer_reviews.text: I used to have one that lasted a long time. I ended up needing a new one but this one I received is very hard to click on. It still works it just takes a while to get it lodged on correctly on the left side. That might just be the one I received but definitely something to watch out for. Super easy for you to just drop your controllers to let them charge.
customer_reviews.author: Kyler Mosher

customer_reviews.title: Great charger.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this charger! I have 1 similar for my PS3 and you have to kind of force the remote re into the charger slot, and the charger always breaks because of that. This 1 you just push down on the charger, it pops up, you simply place the remote on it and push down. It's a great idea. It charges the remotes quickly too. They really need to make this into a quad charger.
customer_reviews.author: Beeswax

customer_reviews.title: Should have heeded the 1-star reviews
customer_reviews.text: Put one controller in and don't touch the charger again and you MIGHT be alright. Touch the charger, breathe on it, look at it sideways, think about it...the controller will unseat and stop charging. Absolutely terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Well organised charging hub for your controllers. Best thing is that you can charge 2 controllers at once, hence saves time. Also, every time you finish playing, you can place your controllers on the stand, making it look clean and every time you come back to play, you do not need to worry about charging the controllers as they are already fueled up.
customer_reviews.author: Vidhit Shah

customer_reviews.title: Completely drains one of my controllers.
customer_reviews.text: I've noticed that after fully charging 2 controllers in this dock and let a couple of days pass without using either of them, one controller will be completely drained of battery life and the other will be fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: CLH26

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for gamers
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for Christmas. He loves it and said it’s not something he would have thought to get. You can charge your controllers without leaving your PlayStation on standby mode. Charges two controllers at once, doesn’t take up much space. Also was supposed to ship after Christmas but ended up arriving before Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: one side broken
customer_reviews.text: Ok product when it was fully working, but after about about 11 months one side became unusable. I believe the usb port is still ok on that side, but it no longer "clicks" down when you push it down. The plastic just doesn't stay down, like a broken pen. Basically it's cheap plastic junk. Can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JMT

customer_reviews.title: Don't work
customer_reviews.text: I have controller of varying ages, some would not charge at all. Some appeared to be charging but when you went to use them had very little charge. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.  This is a very bad product. I also had to return another that was clearly used.
customer_reviews.text: Very clunky design. Barely charges to the point I think it takes the power away from my controllers. I even check to make sure the port is in the controller properly charging because it's terribly designed and inching it stops it from charging.
customer_reviews.author: Antony K.

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this item and it's been really great to always have a controller charging. The first one lasted 4 years without issue. Now only one charger port works but we kept it in order to have 3 controllers charging since we have 2 playstations.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy.
customer_reviews.text: The controllers click in and you push them down to start charging and when they are done being charged they pop up like toast in a toaster. The problem is, you need to get up and push them back down 4-5 times to get a full charge. It also feels really flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Brody's Arts & Crafts LLC

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a while now. If I'm not using my controller it is on the charger. Light comes on when charging and turns off when fully charged. Works great! No problems. Just take your time to my sure you are putting it on right before pushing down to lock it into place. I'm not saying there's not defective ones but I think most people are just freaking animals and don't take good care of there stuff.
customer_reviews.author: JandB

customer_reviews.title: CONVENIENT AND EASY
customer_reviews.text: So much more convenient using this than plugging the cord to charge the controllers. You literally place it on the charger by pressing it down and press down on the controller to remove it off the charger. Plus the light pulses as it's charging and once done, it stops.
customer_reviews.author: Tine

customer_reviews.title: The best PS4 charging dock
customer_reviews.text: Great design and effective charging. When you holster your controller you simply push it down until you feel it click and you're done! To pick it up you press down again and release, the holster will raise the controller up and stop charging. It doesn't get any more simple than that. It does feel a little on the fragile side, but trust me, it's plenty durable. I've had mine for years with absolutely zero issues. 10/10 would recommend. Pros: - Everything Cons: - Nothing
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: You can’t tell when it connects unless you check your PS and sometimes I have left it overnight and it has one or two bars after being on it ALL NIGHT. I would return this but I threw the box out. Just spend a couple extra bucks and get the better one.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I didn't want to leave the ps4 on Rest mode just to charge the controllers. They work well. You can charge two controllers simultaneously (or just one).They come with an AC adapter , so you can charge them pretty much away from the PS4.
customer_reviews.author: E. Almanzar

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: Edit: It seems that once the controllers sit on this thing for too long the controllers need to be reset. After doing this, they were able to be charged up using this device. So, it does work but it's a little wonky. We've had this thing for a little over a month and it is no longer charging our controllers. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Hilariously awful
customer_reviews.text: The dock doesn’t securely seat my controllers. My controllers would stop charging just because someone from a mile away would sneeze. They have to be delicately inserted into the dock and the slightest movement would stop it from charging. I sincerely have no idea how this passed quality assurance. 0/10 shouldn’t be sold anywhere. -IGN
customer_reviews.author: Jay Stamatelaky

customer_reviews.title: Nice charge station
customer_reviews.text: This has been really nice to have. You put the controller on it to charge and done. We really like that it doesn't overcharge. It knows how much charge you already have and only charges til full. Even when on it all night. Simple to use and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Naghma Razi

customer_reviews.title: This dock is extremely easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This dock is extremely easy to use. You just place the controller on it, and press down til it clicks. Then, when ready to play, just push in til it clicks again and it will release. I have used docks in the past that required some maneuvering to get to plug into the port, but this one just works. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a PS4 controller dock.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Definately designed wring. It’s impossible to charge 2 controllers at once. Even when you charge just one you have to set it on there just right Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Paula Suemnick

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working 3 months later
customer_reviews.text: This was a fantastic product for the three months it worked. Not one of my controllers will charge with this device now unless I push down on the controller and hold it in place. Both sides of the unit are doing this and I've only regularly used one side.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely necessary
customer_reviews.text: This is the best charging station or controller charger in general I've found. I have 3 controllers, so even if I'm playing a 2 person game we can always have one charged controller, swapping out as they die. When charging, you just place the controller onto it and use the port closest to you when you're grasping the controller. You click it in (which is incredibly satisfying) and you're done. You don't have to line up the charger to the port like it's a USB cord and it doubles as a controller storage spot. I personally think Sony should find the company and buy the idea. This should be shipped with all PS4s.
customer_reviews.author: iskur

customer_reviews.title: Shocking review
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give this product a better review, but just could not do it. It's a great little charger, it keeps my controllers at full charge at all times so I never have to worry about charging them. It was packaged great, and is a solid product... except for: It will shock you when you attempt to remove controllers from it. I may have received a defective one, and am the exception to the rule, but it shocks me every time I remove my controller from it. It's not powerful enough to hurt too much, but it's enough to annoy. Kind of like a pin prick.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to take controller on and off
customer_reviews.text: After about 4 years of use one of the sides wouldn't let me push the controller down to charge, so I recently bought this a second time. 4 years is a good run and it's a convenient, well designed little charger, so I bought it again. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Techie Type

customer_reviews.title: Easier to just plug the controller in
customer_reviews.text: You have to get the controller in it just right for it to charge. Just a millimeter off, and it stops. Easier to just plug the controller in directly to a USB wire.
customer_reviews.author: Moffer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect charging station!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it months ago! The USB port on my controllers were really worn (for some reason) up to the point where it would not charge my controllers anymore. If you have that problem, I highly recommend buying this charging station! It uses the lower ports of your controller to charge it! It charges quite fast and it'll turn off the light and stop charging once it's fully charged. It the controller is fully depleted, it'll take around 25-30 minutes to fully charge it. However, it's a great place to place your controllers. It looks great, convenient and it'll charge the controllers in the process.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. It's a great idea but this product is not good. You are better off buying something else, or if your controller is broken, please just go watch a video on your to fix your USB ports or change the battery in your controller. I did, and now I'm returning this product and buying new ports and batteries so I can fix the problem myself. Whole lot cheaper than buying a whole new controller!
customer_reviews.author: Julianna

customer_reviews.title: Handy controller charger stores and charges...NIFTY
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, charges quickly. Charges two controllers at once. Average time to a full charge is less than two hours. Just place the controller into the cradle, gently push down until a "click/catch" is heard and felt, and then let your controllers charge. The indicator lights on the PS4 controllers light up orange/yellow to let you know that they have made contact and begun to charge. The charger has a relatively small foot print, so it fits nicely on the shelf next to my PS4 system. Appears well-made. Will update if any quality issues are noted, but we've had this in use at our household for over a month of daily use, very satisfied thusfar.
customer_reviews.author: JP_RN

customer_reviews.title: It charges as it should once you are able to get it locked in
customer_reviews.text: It charged as it should but it’s a pain to get into dock. There has to be a better way to lock controllers in without all the fumbling around every time. Also I have to push it in a few times to make sure it locks in. It charges as it should but I didn’t give it a 5 because of all the work it takes to secure it into the dock.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: loose charging
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think taking a pic is worth it for this product. Like some other reviewers this doesn't cut for me. I press it down and hear the click but it rarely charges without help. It is kinda loss on the charging port. So there, a one star from me. Please fix it.
customer_reviews.author: shy_7930

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. There is no support in the cradle to ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. There is no support in the cradle to hold the controller aside from the tiny adapter pin that goes inside of it to charge, and half of the time when you "click down" the controller to charge, it doesn't stay locked. Also the front charge port doesn't work. Unfortunate, I purchased this as we have 5 controllers and are constantly swapping them out and needed a good charging station.
customer_reviews.author: ZT

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I had a different charging base before that plugged into the cable port off the front of the controller and my son and nephews had that thing wrecked after two weeks. I picked this one up and with the other charging port being in use we haven't had any problems. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Get a cheaper off brand version with light indicators.
customer_reviews.text: In my pic is a cheap off brand one I got, and the PlayStation version can’t compare. The lights let know when it’s charged, ps is a guessing game. The click up/down is not reassuring. Who tested this product? It sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must-have for any gamer.
customer_reviews.text: Love mine. Have three sets (oldest I’ve had since Destiny 1 released) and absolutely no issues. I work two jobs and playing time is usually restricted to one day a week. One of the most frustrating things on a day off, ready to play a game, and your controllers are low battery. No longer an issue with this. Charge it every time I’m done and it shuts off once complete so there’s no overcharge.
customer_reviews.author: SumBuddyPlays

customer_reviews.title: Better than having to replace the controller
customer_reviews.text: After the charging port in the ps4 controller stopped working my son tried to "fix it" and broke the connector. I was about to buy a new controller until I saw that this little gadget can also charge it from the other port. It works, and didn't have to spend $60 for another controller.
customer_reviews.author: FHernan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Best charger you can get.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 4 of these. Super sturdy. They have all been great. I ended up giving them to cousins and nephews when they see it and give me sad puppy eyes. This will be the last one I buy. Sorry kids.
customer_reviews.author: Sunset_rider

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, easy to set up and extremely useful.
customer_reviews.text: This product is really nice and extremely useful. Before, my controllers were constantly dying and needing to be charged. but I only had one cord. This is really helpful, and useful. Plus, it doesn't hook up to the PS4 at all, instead having its own cord which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mason R

customer_reviews.title: New controllers, new charging block, no charge.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this no stars. I bought another one of these, thinking that my original one that I bought with my PS4 was broken. It showed up yesterday, plugged in my brand new out of the box controllers that were delivered today and it does not charge them. The controllers have one bar of battery, and it still just does not work. I can’t tell if the contacts are even inserting into the controller itself. Either way I’m very unhappy with this product. Please be careful if you consider ordering this charging dock.
customer_reviews.author: LegionCast Gaming

customer_reviews.title: Great design.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing worse than sitting down to play and finding that your controller is dead. This charger is easy to use, convenient to place next to your console and charges the controllers quickly. Be sure to "click" it up to protect the charging port on your controller.
customer_reviews.author: William Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: After some time using this charger, I'm disappointed. You place your controller on the dock and push down and it should lock into place and start to charge. But it wont charge every time. Have left my controllers docked overnight and the next day they are at low power.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Barraza

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any PS4 owner, but what the heck is with the price switches?
customer_reviews.text: A must have. I have two controllers and when one almost dies I pop it on the charger and then use the other charger. It turns off/stops charging when your controller is fully charged. PLEASE NOTE: I purchased mine on Amazon Prime Day for roughly $16 dollars. I've seen it the past few weeks for 34-42 dollars and THAT is not worth it. You can get the deluxe version for 20ish bucks with a bonus wire for charging. Docked one pt for the ridiculous price change. I wanted to order the same one for my friends, but had to settle for the deluxe version.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay in charging base....waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The issue with this product is that you have to push the controller down and lock it in place for it to charge. The controller will lock into place for a span of 15 seconds or 5 minutes and then pops back out, thus not charging your controllers. Never once could get this to work correctly.
customer_reviews.author: JACOLE

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in late 2013 and it's still kicking. At this price point I think 5 years is pretty impressive to be charging like it did brand new. The only con is the dainty plastic it's made of. Doesn't feel sturdy and isn't heavy which means the cable will sometimes come out of it's cable mgmt slot. But again that's to be expected at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Nick R

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I bought this after two Nyco charging stations failed after only a week of use. This one is PS certified and works exactly as advertised. I don't have to worry about using removable contact clips that fail or have to line up exactly to charge like the Nyco charger. The controllers fit very snugly into the station after being pressed into the charging position. It actually charges two completely drained controllers faster than the previous ones I purchased. I am extremely satisfied with this and hope it will last for a long time because I am an avid gamer
customer_reviews.author: D. Blanks, Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Works, then doesn't. Find something better
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a month and crapped out. I don't think this is the original product. My sister has the same charging station and umpteen years later the thing still works. This think is crap, find something else
customer_reviews.author: D.r.M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfection in a charging stand
customer_reviews.text: The best controller charger stand I have ever owned. Owning every console under the sun I have had many sub-par to good chargers for my "rechargeable" controllers. This particular one though I have to say is really perfection. The ease of use for this is amazing. No fiddling around trying to get "just the right angle" to get the controller on the cradle-just set it in and "click". It works perfect-EVERY SINGLE TIME! Why can't all chargers be this simple and easy to use for other consoles? It will be your favorite too. I have other brands for this console and you had to fuss and waste time getting it just right. Not with this, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Judkins

customer_reviews.title: Controllers always at the ready!
customer_reviews.text: Love this charger. I am able to have my controllers fully charged and ready to go. This device does not need to be plugged into the PS4. So unlike the stock cable that comes with the system you can charge your controllers without having to leave your ps4 on or in rest mode. Would definately recommend this charger to anyone with a ps4. Once your controller is fully charge it automatically stops charging. So you can just leave your controller plugged into this device without the worry of ruining the life of your internal rechargeable battery.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty much the next evolution of that
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased my PS3 I always had a charging system that allowed me to fill the batteries during periods of non-use. It was stylish and worked well. This is pretty much the next evolution of that. I really enjoy the standalone system as it's better to display the controllers/keep them in one spot. The only thing I don't care for is the way they are sat down into the dock. It doesn't always feel intuitive and you may have to engage it again to activate the charging. That being said, it definitely fulfills my need for a standalone charger and would still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MSMJ Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: This product is much better than any other brand
customer_reviews.text: If you have a PS4, this is what all the Sony Gamers are using nowadays. Don't buy those expensive brand name chargers at gamestop or any other store, because these are high quality and well made. They may see very simple, but they are durable and charge very quickly. They also know when to stop charging, so your controllers are safe from exploding and your batteries will last longer. Also, do not be fooled by the packaging it comes in. I thought it was some cheap rip-off until I actually used the product. This product is much better than any other brand. You can trust me, I've done my share of researching.
customer_reviews.author: XenosLokios

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say other than it works well. Good price, so it's a good value. I actually bought this device and another as I often need to recharge several controllers. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ATF, Jr

customer_reviews.title: No more charging cables!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this charging station to keep my PS4 controller on my desk where I can easily reach it while it's charging. Charging the controller with the USB cable to the PS4 was just too messy for me. I'm really happy with the price and quality of this product. The black plastic matches the PS4 controllers and the plastic used does not feel cheap. I also really like the design of the charging station. It makes it compact for charging two controllers at once. The spring loaded cradle works very well and I've had zero problems mounting/dismounting my controller from the cradle.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work, hasn't charged anything
customer_reviews.text: I can see how it is supposed to work, both sides you push down with controller in dock, but I hear it click, but it is not far enough down to make contact with the charging components. Would require a clamp or something to hold them down. Unfortunately threw away the box, so now I'm stuck with a crappy product that doesn't work. Guess I'll learn and only order sony approved products from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Lee Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for a gamer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend ever time I came over he would charge his sontrollers thru a usb that wasn’t very long it would come out all the time so I bought him this charger dock and he literally loves it so much easier for him to charge his controllers he was very grateful
customer_reviews.author: Christine Borrego

customer_reviews.title: This charger is nice when it works
customer_reviews.text: This charger is nice when it works. Really, I don't have much to say beyond that. The controllers fit on the cradle well enough but sometimes you have to move them around a bit if you don't have them on perfectly. My issue is that sometimes it just doesn't charge. I've made sure to seat it in the cradle and then press down somewhat firmly to ensure a connection but there have been far too many times when I've grabbed a controller off the cradle only to find out it didn't charge. Perhaps about half the time.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel H. Shults

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, easy to use and walk away, NEVER FAILS
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I both have our own ps4 consoles but wanted a means to have quick charges to our controllers. This device seems to charge quicker than having it directly plugged into the PlayStation 4 with the USB cable Pros: Purchased at $14 Charges 2 controllers quickly Can charge 2 controllers actively running two separate PlayStation 4's without syncing them to one another. Has a nice click down device to know your controller is securely fastened on the charger. Have owned this device for 4 months now and with everyday use we have had no issues Cons: 0 so far, will update if that changes
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: It’s a piece of Cr@p!
customer_reviews.text: This did not work properly even one time. It kinda charged one controller then never worked dually (with two controllers) , and never charged any controllers after that again.
customer_reviews.author: Californiahermit

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected
customer_reviews.text: This might be well know product for gamers and they might already know that it is too hard to place the controller and have it clicked lol, this is funny, SONY should be smarter and find better way to do that thing
customer_reviews.author: Allen A

customer_reviews.title: Love this charger. Kids finally cradle the controllers (that's a good thing right?)
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on TV stand and keeps controllers neat and out of the way. Don't have to struggle like with cheap units. This thing makes charging PS4 controllers easy & fast. Love this charger, kids put controllers away now. Easy to pick up whole unit with controllers to clean around - cause your gamers are such neat freaks right :)
customer_reviews.author: AMCAZ RAMBLER

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After One Month
customer_reviews.text: After one month one side of the charging station no longer charges the controller, it lights up then stops working. I am very disappointed since this is a licensed product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure there will be better charging stations for PS4 controllers, but this was one of the few that had good reviews, so I decided to give it a try. It does work. It took a little getting used to finding the right position to put the controller in so that it makes contact with the charger properly. Just push down and when it clicks, you're good. The controller will light up. Not worth 5 stars (the charger I have for my PS3 controllers has better guides to make it super-easy to slide them into place and indicates when the controllers are fully charged...this PS4 one doesn't have such indicators).
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Simple and slick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to replace a single charger that needed an additional adapter to charge. This charging base is very simple to use and doesn't need any addition adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Good charger, very pleased, pretty easy to use and works properly.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected! I found it easy to use and have had no big issues docking the controllers. Usually when I first pop the controller into and push down it pops up and then I push it down further a second time and it locks into place, but not like I struggle with it. I like how it holds them and lights up the controller as its charging and the light is out after charged. I only use once every week or so and probably would have the docking down better if I used it more. It's stable and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Just Luck

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work as well as you think it would. Controllers have to be in a specific spot that they don't always align with. But once you figure it out it works great.
customer_reviews.author: darcsider

customer_reviews.title: Good controller dock/charger
customer_reviews.text: Love this charger. At first, I wasn't sure I was going to like it since it seemed a bit odd on placing and removing? You literally place it gently in the cradle and press down till it clicks, you'll see your controller blink yellow to signify its charging. Once it done, the yellow stops flashing. To remove, just press and it will click and pop up slightly, and you are ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: Chenyu F.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy. PlayStation failed us.
customer_reviews.text: This was complete junk. Fragile, cheap plastic. My main reason for one star is because the controllers aren’t secured in there and any type of movement dislodges them from charging. Also, it says on the box “simultaneously charging” but that hasn’t been true for me.
customer_reviews.author: robin wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for usb chargers if you have kids
customer_reviews.text: Charger works great. It can be a pain to press the controller into the charging port that the only fault. Other than that it charges very well and is much better than constantly replacing usb chargers because my kids break them.
customer_reviews.author: H. Sisson

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and buy one!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I have three PS4 controllers. Before buying the charging station I would charge one at a time and rotate their charge when I was in a particularly long gaming session. Now I have two docked and one in my hand until the battery gets low, then I swap it out for one of the docked ones and keep moving forward. It's awesome. The dock is small and easy to use, it barely takes up the amount of the two controllers sitting back to back and has a relatively fast charge time. I've had mine for a while now and it was definitely a smart purchase...
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Mclaurin Jr.

customer_reviews.title: PowerA DualShock 4 Controller Charging Station for PlayStation 4
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that these were not made by Sony, but was approved basically by them. I took my chance and I'm happy. For less than 20 bucks you get a charger that charges quickly and the best part no plugging into the PS4 for charging my 2 controllers. Even charges controllers faster then using the USB to ps4. Also a good place to just keep your controllers a little more organize as they can hold them without having to charge. Feels a bit cheap but it does the job.Haven't had any problems with the dock so far, easy to plug controllers in & quickly charges. Great product for low price
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer
